definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Many techie toys are wallet-friendly at under $30.
sentences.chinese: 许多技术人员的玩具钱包友好在30美元以下。

sentences.english: He handed the purse t0 the teacher.
Main compartment holds your wallet, small cosmetic case and personal technology.
sentences.chinese: 主隔间认为你的钱包，小化妆盒，个人技术。

sentences.english: His wallet contained a five-dollar bill.
sentences.chinese: 他钱包里有张五美元的钞票。

sentences.english: It made my blood boil to see my son stealing money from my wallet.
sentences.chinese: 我看见我儿子从我钱包里偷钱，肺都气炸了。

sentences.english: Her wallet stolen, she had no money to buy even a bus ticket.
sentences.chinese: 因为钱包被偷了，她甚至连买车票的钱也没有了。

sentences.english: The thief snatched the lady's purse and ran away.
sentences.chinese: 那小偷抢过这女士的钱包跑了。

sentences.english: Zillionaire Wallet, a wallet to amuses you and others.
sentences.chinese: 大富翁钱包，娱人娱己的趣味钱包。

sentences.english: Zillionaire Wallet, a wallet to amuses you and others.
sentences.chinese: 大富翁钱包，娱人娱己的趣味钱包。

sentences.english: Open your wallet and take out a one-dollar bill.
sentences.chinese: 打开钱包，把一张一美元的钞票拿出来。

sentences.english: I don't have much in my wallet, not even cash.
sentences.chinese: 我在钱包里也没放多少现金。

sentences.english: I lost my pocket-book, but I recovered it from the police station.
sentences.chinese: 我把钱包弄丢了，但在警察局找回来了。

sentences.english: She rummaged some change out of her purse.
sentences.chinese: 她从钱包里翻出了一些零钱。

sentences.english: Today is not my day because I lost my purse.
sentences.chinese: 今天是我的背运日，因为我的钱包丢了。

sentences.english: After school, I went to Maxine's classroom to ask her wether my wallet is at home.
sentences.chinese: 放学时，我到阿妹的班级问问她有没有看见我的钱包。

sentences.english: Holds your wallet, sunglasses, personal technology and a cosmetic case.
sentences.chinese: 保存你的钱包，太阳镜，个人技术和化妆箱。

definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
to transfer (money to a bank account)
